column5: Looks like I've missed the first few episodes of this season. Tonight's show is the Lake Champlain episode.
PVR buddy PVR....
Already setup, but once a show is in reruns I delete the timer.
who is your provider? Bell there is an option where you can set to record only new episodes. It's pretty sweet

just watched it. it was on sea lampreys. monsters yes. danger to humans i dont think so.i got one smelt fishing a few years back and it ended up on the highway.the show before that was awesome. he was catching 200lb tarpin in a little rubber tube.
Killer tarpon then lampreys...  I don't think he got a tarpon over 100lbs, lol.   Let's hope the show gets back to giant man eating fish and less of what we've seen the past two episodes.
Yeah, I've had the new episodes on, but didn't really get into them. They were just kind of on as background noise.  S.
There is a finite amount of "monsters" and most are more myth then anything, but for me the lamprey is the creepiest creature he's dealt with.
Glad I'm not the only one...To me Lampreys look like something out of a sci-fi movie!
I don't like those big stingrays he pulls out of nasty, dirty waters. I'm ok with lampreys, but those rays are gross!  S.

Thought last nights show was pretty lame, until he let the lamprey attach itself to his neck. It was at that point that I began to question the guy's sanity. And who knew that Lamprey could trun out to be the other other other other other other white meat!? HH
Yep...I wondered about his sanity when he went into a pool filled with piranha just to see if they'd eat him alive....LOL.
I can't stand the 45 minutes of overdramatic interviews with locals.  Give me a real fishing show any day.
Luckily for you this isn't a real fishing show.
It's an awesome show, must remember to set it up!
agreed, it's as much about the destination, travel and local myth as it is the fishing......one of my favourite shows going lately

Love that show,the natives are my favorite part. Great to see other parts of the world where if you go down to the lake for a wash or swim,you may not come back!!!  .We just don't see these size fish/monsters here.!
I'm just upset that he was not able to catch the Lock Ness Monster ...  I wanted a good close-up of Nessie
Bell sattelite here?  What channel?    Living in dark age.
Discovery 520 regular 1602 HD
Thanks... but hmph!!!  Not in one of our "bundles."
I love the show. It's not just about the fishing, but the travel and local culture and story telling as mentioned above.
Exactly!  .
Great show and like many have said, it's not a fishing show.  The bizarre locations and oddball style fishing it shows is intriguing.  He has an absolute savage on a rod though!  RJ

I do enjoy the show, but wish he would keep it to more "tropical" destinations and unusual species. When he starts to talk about 6 foot killer pike and deadly tarpon it seems silly to me. Talk about some bizarre fish I've never heard of and I might believe that it could be dangerous.
